review.title: “Knights of Columbus!”
review.pros: Pros – It was great! I was able to see all kinds of ideas for weddings/showers/corporate parties. I just loved it! I would recommend it to anyone!
review.cons: Cons – It was a weekend job. The hours were late and it was Friday night, Saturday night and Sunday morning usually.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I don't have any advice for the management there. It was a high school job and it was perfect for a person my age.
